testcase.name: Order T-Shirt
testcase.system-out: Given user is on Home Page..................................................passed When Naigate to signin page.................................................passed And user log into app.......................................................passed When user click on Tshirt menu..............................................passed And Uer click on selected product...........................................passed And Add procudt to cart.....................................................passed And user click on proceed to checkout.......................................passed And user should navigate to summary and click on proceed to checkout........passed And user should navigate to address confirmation stage and click on proceed to checkout.passed And user should navigate to SHIPPING details and click on checkbox and proceed to checkout.passed And select payment method as pay by check...................................passed And user click on I confirm my order........................................passed And user navigate to Order history page.....................................passed Then Validate the order refference..........................................passed
